name: I created a level seven civilization using cutting-edge technology.
summary: Tang Ke activates the high-tech system and tests it on his wife's car. That evening, my wife went to attend the live broadcast ceremony. Unexpectedly, on their way home, they were kidnapped. A thrilling spectacle unfolded on the road. "Is that really a female driver? How can she drive so recklessly?" "Holy crap, drifting through a corner?! How can she even drift?!" "Boss, why can't our guns penetrate the tires?!" "Wait a minute, why is this car deforming?" now... Netizens were shocked. My wife sat in the car, listening to the prompts from the artificial intelligence. He looked completely bewildered. Is this what my husband meant by "made a slight modification"?
author: The Talking Immortal
